ma muniwatha rakima hara wena magak nowina,itha adu mudalakata ma hata bodimak soya ganima ma lada jayagrahanayak wiya.bodime ma wadi kalayak gatha nokare amathara wada thibu nisa ya.bodima niwasak wiya,niwase eliyen sadu wenama kamarayak ma hata labina.kama laba denne nam thawa sulu mudalak wadi wu namuth eya ma hata labhadayi wu nisa eeta da kamathi wiya.bodim wu niwase piya miya gos sitiya ya,pawule daruwan thun deneku siti ek daruwek upathinma yam adupadu sahitha wi othpalawa siti,anek wadi mahalu pirimi daruwa usas adhyapana ya sadaha sudusukam labuwa da niwase agahiga kam nisa kuli wada wala nirath wemin siti.mawa hadunkuru sadana sthanaya wada sadaha pitawa yayi.thawa un ekama dariya wimala wiya.aya niwase siyalu adupadu balamin katayuthu kala thanaththiya wiya,aa niwasata wi kalaya gatha kara ya.udasana pitawa yana ma nawatha enne boho wita sawasa hathata pamana ya.
